price: Mofri mmaa no akyi de akͻnnͻ kͻ mmarima so? Daabi, moyε amanfoͻ bi a mo adwen awuo.
arabic: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
